name: Space Shooter (itch) (joshi1999)
description:
This a simple Space Shooter game, written in Java.
To play the game, you need to have Java 17 (or higher) installed.

Play this game with your keyboard.
W - Up
S - Down
Space - Shoot
Esc - Pause



Credits go to Kenney and his awsesome assets! (www.kenney.nl)
